patterns.message: Boundary Violation: Data Engine and Shared modules must not import from Studio Core. Interaction must occur via the @contract layer or LiveBus.
Boundary Violation: Studio Core must not import directly from Data Engine logic. Use @contract or shared hooks instead.
Critical Boundary Violation: Non-Studio modules are strictly prohibited from depending on Studio Core internals.
Boundary Violation: Direct dependency on application entry points or legacy root services is prohibited. Use @shared or @contract.
Contract Layer Violation: The contract must be a dependency-free source of truth. It cannot import from feature modules or shared utilities.
